page.title: 12Leisure Time in Durris
page.content: There are very few amenities in our block,especially for children,but they can still enjoy themselves,as the following account shows. On a weekend day ,if it is fine,I usually go for a walk up in the woods.My sister and brother come too. Sometimes I go for a cycle ride.It's a great view when you go cycling round the countryside.You can hear a lot of birds nearby.I occasionally walk up to our local football pitch.There is a farm track up by the pitch where a herd of cattle live.In Clune Wood there is a stone circle that is quite interesting,but it is quite a long walk from my house.I might go down to visit my friend who lives down in Woodlands Park.You have to go past a lot of houses and down a long,narrow road.She lives in Durris House.
